content.rendered:
How about making this summer a whitewater summer! Our rivers here in Colorado make for a trip of a lifetime and most rivers can be run commercially and non-commercially. Rafting, kayaking, and paddleboarding are all whitewater fun that you and your family can enjoy this summer.

You can buy your own gear and run the rivers, but if you are new to the whitewater life I would recommend taking a commercial trip. It’s best when learning any extreme sport is to have experienced professional teach you. Commercial trips will be much cheaper than buying all you own equipment and guides know exactly where to take you on the river, making sure you have the best time. Rafting companies will match you on an appropriate trip depending on your skill level, age etc. We offer trips such as ⅓ of a day ½  day, ¾ day, full day and even overnights. So if you have a tight schedule don't fret we have all sorts of different times running throughout the day, so just pick your time and you will be on your way to a fun time.

Currently we are having a fantabulous whitewater season in Colorado. The rivers are raging making your inner adrenaline junkie extremely happy. With water levels high this summer, we can expect a long season this year. Paddling season with AVA Rafting goes until Labor Day so don’t worry if you’re coming to Colorado late this summer!  AVA Rafting has any trip you want to venture on, whether it be a paddle board trip, inflatable kayak, or raft trip we have the perfect trip for you
